name: rouille
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a thick sauce from France made with very small pieces of bread, olive oil (= oil made from a small, bitter, green or black fruit), garlic, and spicy peppers: He served us roast haddock with rouille. The seafood platter comes with a creamy rouille.
More examplesFewer examplesAfter I finished making the rouille, I spread it over small slices of toast.Every lunchtime we ate fish soup with rouille.Recipes for rouille can contain pretty much anything.
